metadata.title: RHSA-2021:2664: Ansible security and bug fix update (2.9.23) (Important)
metadata.description:
Ansible is a simple model-driven configuration management, multi-node
deployment, and remote-task execution system. Ansible works over SSH and
does not require any software or daemons to be installed on remote nodes.
Extension modules can be written in any language and are transferred to
managed machines automatically.

The following packages have been upgraded to a newer upstream version:
ansible (2.9.23)

Bug Fix(es):
* CVE-2021-3583 ansible: Template Injection through yaml multi-line strings
with ansible facts used in template.

See:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/v2.9.23/changelogs/CHANGELOG-v2.9.rst
for details on bug fixes in this release.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2021-3583 ansible: Template Injection through yaml multi-line strings with ansible facts used in template.

platform: Red Hat Ansible Engine 2 for RHEL 8

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
ansible is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
ansible-test is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
